about_the_game:
*This game is not yet available in English, but there are plans to develop it.

Introduction:

Welcome to the Sacred Soufragon Kingdom,
A land that claims the name of the Dragon's Breath,
A land that is neither sacred, nor blessed by dragon's breath, nor ruled by a king.

A land where Devils and Demons wage an eternal war,
Where mortals survive only because these beings are too busy fighting each other to bother with them.

The once-free nation is no more. The values of the Devils have corrupted this land, while the Demons see its people as nothing more than snacks.

Your journey begins with the intervention of a mischievous god.
This deity has chained you to the cruel game of life and death, forcing you to become a piece on this treacherous chessboard.

Fortunately, even though your fate has been altered by the God of Chaos, you still possess free will.
In this turbulent land, you have the power to rewrite your destiny and change the future of this kingdom.

Companions:

Meet the companions of this tale:

  • A count renowned for his debauchery, a member of the royal family, and a sorcerer gifted with immense magical power.

  • A paladin from a distant land, possessing a strong sense of justice and a good sense of humor.

  • A halfling slave who escaped from an expansionist nation.

  • An elf ascetic with a penchant for self-destruction and a mysterious origin.

  • An orc cleric from a theocratic and authoritarian regime.

  • A former noble assassin who has fallen from grace and become a gang killer.

  • A half-elf bard who once served as a spy.

  • A terrorist who also happens to be a skilled healer and an elven oracle.

  • A simple wizard girl from a faraway land, seeking to uncover the mystery of her origins.

Game Features:

This game is independently developed by a passionate CRPG enthusiast.
It draws inspiration from classic titles such as:
Dragon Age: Origins, Baldur's Gate 1 & 2, Neverwinter Nights, Solasta: Crown of the Magister, and Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous, Fallout : New Vegas.

While this game does not feature grid-based combat due to technical constraints, the combat system is designed to be deadly and decisive. It emphasizes both team synergy and strategic elements.

The game offers a highly immersive role-playing experience, allowing players to:

  • Create their own protagonist: Choose your background, race, beliefs, and moral alignment.

  • Diverse character progression: Four main archetypes with a total of eleven classes, seven race options, and eight schools of magic to master.

On this fantastical planet called "Tihws",
You can choose to be a paladin of justice,
A freed slave fighting for liberation, or a noble of high status.

Play as a human, elf, half-elf, orc, dwarf, halfling,
Or even a Mongrel born with demon blood.

Forge your unique path with deep character customization: shape your hero’s (or villain's) race, background, beliefs, and moral compass. Whether you choose to walk the path of righteousness or embrace the shadows, your decisions will shape the future of the kingdom and its people.

content_descriptors.notes:
Sexual Content and Mature Themes: Contains implied sexual themes, with scenes fading to black or indirectly referenced.
No explicit descriptions or visual depictions are included.Player discretion is advised.

Violence: Includes fantasy violence with blood effects but no extreme gore.

Profanity: Occasional use of strong language and profanity, limited to certain character dialogues for narrative purposes.

Political and Religious Themes: The game explores themes of morality, faith, and power structures, based on fictional metaphors and symbolism. While some elements may resemble real-world political and religious events, they do not directly reference specific real-world events or individuals.

Other Notes: Mature content supports story realism and character development but may not suit all audiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280*720 Display

short_description: An homage to classic RPGs, set in a fantasy realm filled with conflict and intrigue. You will take on the role of a resurrected hero or villain, using your actions and choices to shape your fate and the destiny of the kingdom.
